ygData.subject: Re: Faction shmaction
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Whaaa? I don t think this is true. Maybe he means killing faeries... but pixie tricksters need to be exterminated because they are setting fires to the
ygData.messageBody:
> The same goes for killing too many Pixies in Greater Faydark. The
>Kelethin Guards, (as idiotic as they are), will attack you on sight if you
>kill too many.

Whaaa? I don't think this is true. Maybe he means killing faeries... but
pixie tricksters need to be exterminated because they are setting fires to
the forest, and if they continue, our beloved Faydark will soon be gone (or
so my Ranger guildmaster told me). I can't believe the Rangers would have us
killing a 'nice' creature.

In fact, I'm willing to bet it is faeries... because one time my earth
elemental attacked a faerie (the faeries appear aggressive, even though they
don't attack me at my level, and the pet picks up on this aggressiveness)
and though I told him to back off, the faerie killed my pet and proceeded to
chase after me (I took off running when I saw my elemental was dying). I ran
to the guards, and they did nothing at all... and it wasn't one of those
'the guard didn't see' kind of things, because I had a very good start on
the faerie, and there were several minutes of me running back and forth in
front of the guards while they snickered at me and rolled their eyes!

Now, one of the things I hope to never hear again is, 'Jobaner says, 'Time
to die a faerie guard.''

Scylla
